column4: When I first installed Gutsy, I could access my computer in the network, but now, I can't... anyone experiencing this?
When I first installed Gutsy, I could access my Windows computer in the network, but now, I can't... It displays "Can't display all contents in the Folder"...

I'm getting similar problems -- samba says it can't find the local windows machine, possibly because of firewall settings.  I ought to see what's going on there, but I'm swamped with so many other little things.
Hmm, maybe... I will try some tests, thanks
